name: Gribluns
description:
Welcome to Gribluns!  a game by me, Tyler Rhodes for Team Dogpit's Virtual Pet Jam
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Fling 'em! Slam 'em! Hatch 'em! Love 'em! Play with over 300 different Gribluns right from the comfort of your own Desktop! But be careful! Gribluns require constant attention or they will leave this world forever ): ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ How to Play Use your Mouse to grab an egg to hatch. Eggs appear every minute. Grab a Griblun with Left Click and slam them into things! It's fun! If Gribluns start looking sluggish, grab something! They'll be glad you did! To Quit, hit the X button at the top of your screen.  Hit the Sound Icon at the top of your screen to Mute and Unmute the audio. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Special Thanks to: Bearsharktopus Studios for their LookingGlass AI, which was used to generate the Gribluns!
LemauDev
Keenan Woodall
Pheonise
Valentina Hawes

Bell recording by Dane Casperson
